vulnerabilities.title: Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) in GitHub repository ionicabizau/parse-url
vulnerabilities.description: Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) in GitHub repository ionicabizau/parse-url prior to 8.1.0.

vulnerabilities.title: parse-url parses http URLs incorrectly, making it vulnerable to host name spoofing
vulnerabilities.description: parse-url prior to 8.1.0 is vulnerable to Misinterpretation of Input. parse-url parses certain http or https URLs incorrectly, identifying the URL's protocol as ssh. It may also parse the host name incorrectly.

vulnerabilities.title: Cross site scripting in parse-url
vulnerabilities.description: Cross-site Scripting (XSS) - Stored in GitHub repository ionicabizau/parse-url prior to 7.0.0.

vulnerabilities.title: Cross site scripting in parse-url
vulnerabilities.description: Cross-site Scripting (XSS) - Generic in GitHub repository ionicabizau/parse-url prior to 6.0.1

vulnerabilities.title: Server-Side Request Forgery in parse-url
vulnerabilities.description: Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) in GitHub repository ionicabizau/parse-url prior to 7.0.0.

vulnerabilities.title: Hostname confusion in parse-url
vulnerabilities.description: Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor via hostname confusion in GitHub repository ionicabizau/parse-url prior to 6.0.1
